alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 8:06PM CDT until April 16 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bentonia. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to begin a slow fall. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 22.4 Wed 7 pm CDT 22.3 22.2 21.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
